results.content_html: Really well explained and very informative - great course!

results.content: This is a very good course.  Mr. Hur shows how to develop a fairly simple program on both the frontend and the backend.  And he does an exceptional job of doing this.  Perhaps for his next course he will replicate much of this but use a MongoDB database on the back end.  Kudos.

response.content: Hi Jeff.  Thank you the five stars, and I am grateful for your kind remarks!  Your suggestion is also appreciated.  It might be an excellent chapter to be added to the course.
response.content_html: Hi Jeff. Thank you the five stars, and I am grateful for your kind remarks! Your suggestion is also appreciated. It might be an excellent chapter to be added to the course.

results.content_html: This is a very good course. Mr. Hur shows how to develop a fairly simple program on both the frontend and the backend. And he does an exceptional job of doing this. Perhaps for his next course he will replicate much of this but use a MongoDB database on the back end. Kudos.
